Nie wykonuj prac innych ludzi, szczególnie tam, gdzie znaczenie dla ciebie osobiście jest niskie. Obejmuje to również pełnienie roli ochrony.
## Poprawka MRP To jest egzekwowane bardziej surowo na MRP.

## MRP Amendment This is enforced more strictly on MRP.
## Examples Acceptable: - As an engineer, helping the bartender remodel the bar. - As a bartender, remodeling the bar. - As a passenger, building a maintenance bar. - As an engineer, reinforcing substations. - As an engineer, increasing the security of airlocks. - As an atmospherics technician, improving atmospheric systems. - As a passenger, fighting nuclear operatives. - As a passenger, fighting or preparing to defend yourself from someone who has been trying to kill you. - As a crewmember on a station with no engineering department, you complete engineering tasks.
